title: Boris Johnson did say this about Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister without an election
subtitle: The now Prime Minister said in 2007 that Gordon Brown taking over from Tony Blair was a “scandal”.
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
Boris Johnson did say this about Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister without an election

A Facebook post claiming Boris Johnson said Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister without a general election was a “scandal” and “nothing less than a palace coup” has been shared almost 3,000 times on Facebook.

Boris Johnson did indeed write these words in 2007, in the Telegraph, while MP for Henley.

This article is part of our work fact checking potentially false pictures, videos and stories on Facebook. You can read more about this—and find out how to report Facebook content—here. For the purposes of that scheme, we’ve rated this claim as true as he did write this.
